data.title: Vineyard, Olive Orchard and Ranch Tour in Petaluma, CA
data.meta_description: Wander the McEvoy Ranch vineyards, olive orchards and gardens on an exclusive walkabout tour. Schedule your visit to our Petaluma Ranch today.
data.text:
Public Ranch & Art Tour

$55

This public tour begins at our Tasting Room in the heart of the Lower Ranch. Walk down our beautiful Poplar Tree Lane and journey through olive orchards to the Upper Ranch. Along the way learn how McEvoy Ranch became a California olive oil industry leader and enjoy a selection of outdoor sculptures & paintings from the McEvoy family private art collection.Youâ€™ll then be guided through our Frantoio (i.e., Olive Oil Mill) and conclude with a sampling of our award-winning olive oil.

Member Guest Benefits

The Estate: Complimentary for 4

The Orchard & Vineyard: Complimentary for 2

Children 5 & under: Complimentary
